objects.text:
• Refreshing unisex fragrance
• Premium EDT concentration
• 100ml / 3.4 fl. oz size
• Elegant design with gold cap

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Captivating Aquatic Freshness for All
product_details.description:
• Refreshing unisex fragrance suitable for all gender expressions
• Premium eau de toilette concentration for lasting scent
• Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size for extended use
• Elegant turquoise bottle design with luxurious gold cap
• Perfect for daily wear and casual occasions
• Modern and versatile fragrance profile
• Professional-grade perfume quality
• Sleek, contemporary packaging design
• Travel-friendly size bottle
• High-end fragrance at competitive price point

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold and modern composition designed for a unisex perfume product. The background utilizes a diagonal split gradient transitioning from teal to deep navy, adding dynamic visual contrast. At the top, a stylized uppercase brand name (`heading`) is rendered in a playful outlined font, accompanied by a vibrant yellow and bold uppercase subheading (`subheading`) to emphasize freshness and unisex appeal.

Below, italic serif body text (`tagline`) describes the essence of the product, followed by a bullet-point details section (`description`) that outlines the product features. On the bottom left, the price (`price`) is highlighted using large, bold yellow type with a rupee symbol, next to a bright yellow call-to-action button (`cta_background`) labeled with a focused dark teal message (`cta`).

The hero image (`product_image`) of the fragrance bottle is positioned prominently on the right side, scaled for balance and visibility.

**Color Palette:**
- **Teal**: #00959e
- **Deep Navy**: #003b45
- **Gold Yellow**: #FFD700
- **Accent Gold**: #D4AF37
- **White**: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image for Bellavita Fresh Unisex Eau de Toilette features a vibrant, refreshing color scheme ideal for an advertisement banner. The dominant turquoise (#00B6BD) conveys a sense of freshness and energy, reflecting the product's theme. Gold (#D4AF37) is used for the cap and the text, adding a luxurious and premium touch. The contrast between the cool turquoise and warm gold creates an appealing visual harmony. The smooth gradient of light and shadows on the bottle enhances its dimensionality, and the metallic shine subtly highlights the product’s elegance. Supporting tones like white (#FFFFFF) for shadow accents boost clarity and readability.
